comments.body:
What do you think about replacing the checkboxes with words?

✅ becomes "Semi-automatic"

✔️ becomes "Automatic"
We can do that, I was just thinking the idea was to use those ticks?
Seeing the table now, I'm not convinced which one of ✔️ and ✅ intuitively means more complete than the other. I think the words "Automatic" and "Semi-automatic" are more self-explanatory.
Changed - let me know what you think
